summary: This module provides utility functions for FastCGI protocol implementation in Apache HTTP Server. It handles encoding and decoding of FastCGI headers, request bodies, and environment variables for communication with FastCGI applications.

logs.message_template: ap_fcgi_encode_env: out of space encoding environment
logs.reason: This error occurs when there is insufficient buffer space to encode all environment variables. Likely due to either a very large number of environment variables or unusually long variable names/values.
logs.resolution: Increase the buffer size provided to the function or reduce the number/size of environment variables being passed to FastCGI applications. Check if the application requires all environment variables or if some can be omitted.
